name: Green Foundation
description: What is the project about? Green foundation is REFI project Regenerative finance, often known as ReFi, refers to a financial system that puts the resilience and health of ecosystems, communities, and the planet ahead of personal financial gain.It marks a break from conventional finance, which has been criticized for prioritizing short-term gains over long-term What makes your project unique? The reason behind selecting the Green Foundation project is straightforward. Our mission is to promote the use of clean and renewable energy in a sustainable manner. To accomplish this, we fund afforestation projects that produce carbon credits and sustain our ecosystem History of your project. Start from 10 APR, 2023 What’s next for your project? A start toward expanding our purpose into Web3 space is through ReFi, a platform for individuals worldwide using blockchain technology that rewards contributors for protecting the environment. What can your token be used for? ◉ Empower people to donate TripX towards carbon offsets; ◉ Improve and decentralize the Green Foundation Refi ecosystem ◉ Use TripX to regenerate the world.
